p: The serum E7777 concentration‐time profiles after the start of treatment on day 1, cycle 1 are shown in Figure 1. Once reaching C max, E7777 was eliminated rapidly from the serum. The mean t 1/2 value, CL, and V ss after treatment ranges on day 1, cycle 1 were 75.5‐92.5 min, 0.398‐0.430 mL/min/kg, and 47.9‐58.4 mL/kg, respectively.
